Trademark Renewal Request - USA
Please fill out the following form, once your Trademark Renewal is obtained, we will send you a Renewal Report and copy of your new Registration Certificate. Notice that the price of trademark renewal depend on "Trademark Type", and also in the number of classes in which the trademark is currently registered.
Select Trademark Type
YOUR BRAND
Enter Registration Number of the Trademark
Please enter a valid registration number
Number of Classes
Please let us know the class(es) in which the trademark is currently registered.
Late Filing of Power of Attorney
You want us to hold the application filing until we receive the Power of Attorney.
You want us to immediatly file your trademark. Notice that this option has an additonal cost, and you have a time limit to send the Power of Attorney.
